<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGEN: do NOT edit in this block -->

**command: `/renderdist`**

**quick ref:**
> /renderdist [10-200]

**description:**

```
render distance between 10 and maxrenderdist. 
The upper limit is set by command /maxrenderdist 
/renderdist 96
```

<!-- END_AUTOGEN-->
输入该命令可以调整当期世界中的可视距离。
> /renderdist [10-200]设置的数值越大可见度越高。
